dt-option.name: rowGroup.hideIfSame
dt-option.summary: Hide the grouping row if all rows are in a single group

type.description: As a boolean value this property will control whether groups are hidden or not if all rows are in a single group.

dt-option.default: Grouping will not be hidden if all rows are in a single group.
dt-option.description: This option can be used to optionally disable the display of grouping rows if all rows are in a single group. In such a case the grouping row could be seen as redundant.

example.title: Hide the grouping row if only a single group of data is present
